The '''New England Center for Circus Arts''' ('''NECCA''') is a circus school located in Brattleboro, Vermont, United States. Founded in 1999, NECCA offers professional training, recreational classes, and youth programs in circus arts.

== Relevance to flow arts ==

[[Lorq Nichols]] has taught at NECCA, bringing [[flow arts]] theory and [[poi]] instruction to the circus training environment.<ref name="lorq-about">{{cite web |url=https://sirlorq.wordpress.com/about-2/ |title=About |publisher=Sir Lorq |access-date=2026-02-08}}</ref> NECCA's curriculum includes object manipulation disciplines that overlap with flow arts, such as juggling, [[Contact juggling|contact juggling]], and staff manipulation.
